statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM ComedyClubCustomers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM ComedyClubCustomers WHERE membership_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_name FROM ComedyClubCustomers WHERE customer_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM ComedyClubCustomers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_id, customer_email FROM ComedyClubCustomers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM ComedyClubCustomers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM ComedyClubCustomers WHERE membership_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM ComedyClubCustomers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM ComedyClubCustomers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_phone DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComedyClubCustomers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Ticket WHERE show_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) as total_tickets FROM Ticket GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_tickets > 5;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, last_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT ticket_id, show_time, ticket_price, seat_number FROM Ticket WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, t.show_time, t.ticket_price FROM Customer c INNER JOIN Ticket t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id ORDER BY t.show_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM Events;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, purchase_date FROM Tickets;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, event_name, ticket_price FROM Customers JOIN Tickets ON Customers.customer_id = Tickets.customer_id JOIN Events ON Tickets.event_id = Events.event_id WHERE ticket_price > 50;

SELECT customer_name, event_name, purchase_date FROM Customers JOIN Tickets ON Customers.customer_id = Tickets.customer_id JOIN Events ON Tickets.event_id = Events.event_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT show_name, show_date, show_time FROM shows ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM bookings GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_bookings > 2;

SELECT bookings.booking_id, customers.first_name, shows.show_name, bookings.booking_date FROM bookings JOIN customers ON bookings.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN shows ON bookings.show_id = shows.show_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT show_name, show_date FROM shows WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY show_date ASC;
SELECT comedian_name, comedian_specialty FROM comedians WHERE comedian_specialty = 'Stand-up';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price < 50 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT show_name, show_date, show_time FROM shows WHERE show_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY show_date ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, shows.show_name, tickets.ticket_price FROM customers INNER JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id INNER JOIN shows ON tickets.show_id = shows.show_id WHERE tickets.ticket_price > 50;

SELECT comedians.comedian_name, comedians.comedian_specialty, show_lineup.show_id FROM comedians INNER JOIN show_lineup ON comedians.comedian_id = show_lineup.comedian_id WHERE comedian_specialty = 'Stand-up Comedy';
